value.title: Value
value.description: Value to display. If it is parseable as a number, it will format as a number.

comparisonValue.title: Value
comparisonValue.description: Used to display a change indicator.

format.title: Format type
format.description: Describes the formatting for the value (number, percent, currency, ordinal). See @vizia/format.

currency.title: Currency code
currency.description: Specify a currency code (e.g. GBP, JPY). See @vizia/format.

invertSentiment.title: Invert sentiment
invertSentiment.description: Flag to invert the change indicator sentiment, to make a positive change format in a negative style (e.g. bounce rate)
